001package imagingbook.calibration.zhang;
002
003import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Random;
007
008import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
009import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
010import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
011import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
012import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
013import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
014import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
015import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
016import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
017
018import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.util.MathUtil;
019import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
020
021/**
022 * This class defines methods for estimating the homography (projective)
023 * transformation between pairs of 2D point sets.
024 * @author WB
025 */
026public class HomographyEstimator {
027        
028        private static int MaxLmEvaluations = 1000;
029        private static int MaxLmIterations = 1000;
030        
031        private final boolean normalizePointCoordinates;
032        private final boolean doNonlinearRefinement;
033        
034        // ------------------------------------------------------------
035        
036        public HomographyEstimator() {
037                this(true, true);
038        }
039        
040        public HomographyEstimator(boolean normalizePointCoordinates, boolean doNonlinearRefinement) {
041                this.normalizePointCoordinates = normalizePointCoordinates;
042                this.doNonlinearRefinement = doNonlinearRefinement;
043        }
044        
045        // ------------------------------------------------------------
046        
047        /**
048         * Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and
049         * multiple observations (image point sets).
050         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
051         * @param modelPts a sequence of 2D points on the model (calibration target)
052         * @param obsPoints a sequence 2D image point sets (one set per view).
053         * @return the sequence of estimated homographies (3 x 3 matrices), one for each view
054         */
055        public RealMatrix[] estimateHomographies(Point2D[] modelPts, Point2D[][] obsPoints) {
056                final int M = obsPoints.length;
057                RealMatrix[] homographies = new RealMatrix[M];
058                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
059                        RealMatrix Hinit = estimateHomography(modelPts, obsPoints[i]);
060                        RealMatrix H = doNonlinearRefinement ?
061                                        refineHomography(Hinit, modelPts, obsPoints[i]) : Hinit;
062                        homographies[i] = H;
063                }
064                return homographies;
065        }
066        
067        /**
068         * Estimates the homography (projective) transformation from two given 2D point sets.
069         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
070         * @param ptsA the 1st sequence of 2D points 
071         * @param ptsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
072         * @return the estimated homography (3 x 3 matrix)
073         */
074        public RealMatrix estimateHomography(Point2D[] ptsA, Point2D[] ptsB) {
075                int n = ptsA.length;
076                
077                RealMatrix Na = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? getNormalisationMatrix(ptsA) : MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);
078                RealMatrix Nb = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? getNormalisationMatrix(ptsB) : MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);   
079                RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(n * 2, 9);
080
081                for (int j = 0, r = 0; j < ptsA.length; j++) {
082                        final double[] pA = transform(MathUtil.toArray(ptsA[j]), Na);
083                        final double[] pB = transform(MathUtil.toArray(ptsB[j]), Nb);
084                        final double xA = pA[0];
085                        final double yA = pA[1];
086                        final double xB = pB[0];
087                        final double yB = pB[1];                        
088                        M.setRow(r + 0, new double[] {xA, yA, 1, 0, 0, 0, -(xA * xB), -(yA * xB), -(xB)});
089                        M.setRow(r + 1, new double[] {0, 0, 0, xA, yA, 1, -(xA * yB), -(yA * yB), -(yB)});
090                        r = r + 2;
091                }
092
093                // find h, such that M . h = 0:
094                double[] h = MathUtil.solveHomogeneousSystem(M).toArray();
095                
096                // assemble homography matrix H from h:
097                RealMatrix H = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] 
098                                {{h[0], h[1], h[2]},
099                                 {h[3], h[4], h[5]},
100                                 {h[6], h[7], h[8]}} );
101
102                // de-normalize the homography
103                H = MatrixUtils.inverse(Nb).multiply(H).multiply(Na);
104                
105                // rescale M such that H[2][2] = 1 (unless H[2][2] close to 0)
106                if (Math.abs(H.getEntry(2, 2)) > 10e-8) {
107                        H = H.scalarMultiply(1.0 / H.getEntry(2, 2));
108                }
109                
110                return doNonlinearRefinement ? refineHomography(H, ptsA, ptsB) : H;
111        }
112        
113
114        /**
115         * Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.
116         * @param Hinit the initial (estimated) homography matrix
117         * @param pntsA the 1st sequence of 2D points 
118         * @param pntsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
119         * @return the refined homography matrix
120         */
121        public RealMatrix refineHomography(RealMatrix Hinit, Point2D[] pntsA, Point2D[] pntsB) {
122                final int M = pntsA.length;             
123                double[] observed = new double[2 * M];
124                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
125                        observed[i * 2 + 0] = pntsB[i].getX();
126                        observed[i * 2 + 1] = pntsB[i].getY();
127                }                       
128                MultivariateVectorFunction value = getValueFunction(pntsA);
129                MultivariateMatrixFunction jacobian = getJacobianFunction(pntsA);
130                
131                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
132                                LeastSquaresFactory.model(value, jacobian),
133                                MatrixUtils.createRealVector(observed), 
134                                MathUtil.getRowPackedVector(Hinit), 
135                                null,  // ConvergenceChecker
136                                MaxLmEvaluations, 
137                                MaxLmIterations);
138                
139                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer lm = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
140                Optimum result = lm.optimize(problem);
141                
142                RealVector optimum = result.getPoint();
143                RealMatrix Hopt = MathUtil.fromRowPackedVector(optimum, 3, 3);
144                int iterations = result.getIterations();
145                if (iterations >= MaxLmIterations) {
146                        throw new RuntimeException("refineHomography(): max. number of iterations exceeded");
147                }
148                //System.out.println("LM optimizer iterations " + iterations);
149
150                return Hopt.scalarMultiply(1.0 / Hopt.getEntry(2, 2));
151        }
152        
153        
154        private MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction(final Point2D[] X) {
155                //System.out.println("MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction");
156                return new MultivariateVectorFunction() {
157                        public double[] value(double[] h) {
158                                
159                                final double[] Y = new double[X.length * 2];
160                                for (int j = 0; j < X.length; j++) {
161                                        final double x = X[j].getX();
162                                        final double y = X[j].getY();
163                                        final double w = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
164                                        Y[j * 2 + 0] = (h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2]) / w;
165                                        Y[j * 2 + 1] = (h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5]) / w;
166                                }
167                                return Y;
168                        }
169                };
170        }
171        
172        protected MultivariateMatrixFunction getJacobianFunction(final Point2D[] X) {
173                return new MultivariateMatrixFunction() {
174                        public double[][] value(double[] h) {
175                                final double[][] J = new double[2 * X.length][];
176                                for (int i = 0; i < X.length; i++) {
177                                        final double x = X[i].getX();
178                                        final double y = X[i].getY();
179                                        
180                                        final double w  = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
181                                        final double w2 = w * w;
182                                        
183                                        final double sx = h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2];           
184                                        J[2 * i + 0] = new double[] {x/w, y/w, 1/w, 0, 0, 0, -sx*x/w2, -sx*y/w2, -sx/w2};
185                                        
186                                        final double sy = h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5];
187                                        J[2 * i + 1] = new double[] {0, 0, 0, x/w, y/w, 1/w, -sy*x/w2, -sy*y/w2, -sy/w2};
188                                }
189                                return J;
190                        }
191                };
192        }
193
194/*

285        
286        
287        private static double[] transform(double[] p, RealMatrix M3x3) {
288                if (p.length != 2) {
289                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("transform(): vector p must be of length 2 but is " + p.length);
290                }
291                double[] pA = MathUtil.toHomogeneous(p);
292                double[] pAt = M3x3.operate(pA);
293                return MathUtil.toCartesian(pAt); // need to de-homogenize, since pAt[2] == 1?
294        }
295        
296        private RealMatrix getNormalisationMatrix(Point2D[] pnts) {
297                final int N = pnts.length;
298                double[] x = new double[N];
299                double[] y = new double[N];
300                
301                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
302                        x[i] = pnts[i].getX();
303                        y[i] = pnts[i].getY();
304                }
305                
306                // calculate the means in x/y
307                double meanx = MathUtil.mean(x);
308                double meany = MathUtil.mean(y);
309
310                // calculate the variances in x/y
311                double varx = MathUtil.variance(x);
312                double vary = MathUtil.variance(y);
313                
314                double sx = Math.sqrt(2 / varx);
315                double sy = Math.sqrt(2 / vary);
316
317                RealMatrix matrixA = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] {
318                                { sx,  0, -sx * meanx},
319                                {  0, sy, -sy * meany},
320                                {  0,  0,           1 }});
321                
322                return matrixA;
323        }
324        
325
326        // TESTING --------------------------------------------------------
327        
328        static double NOISE = 0.1;
329        
330        private static Point2D mapPoint(RealMatrix H, Point2D p) {
331                double[] xa = {p.getX(), p.getY()};
332                double[] xb = transform(xa, H);
333                return new Point2D.Double(xb[0], xb[1]);
334        }
335        
336        static Random rand = new Random(17);
337        
338        private static Point2D mapPointWithNoise(RealMatrix H, Point2D p, double noise) {
339                double[] xa = {p.getX(), p.getY()};
340                double[] xb = transform(xa, H);
341                double xn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
342                double yn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
343                return new Point2D.Double(xb[0] + xn, xb[1] + yn);
344        }
345        
346        /**
347         * Used for testing only.
348         * TODO: convert to JUnit tests!
349         * @param args ignored
350         */
351        public static void main(String[] args) {
352                RealMatrix Hreal = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
353                                {{3, 2, -1},
354                                {5, 0, 2},
355                                {4, 4, 9}});
356
357                System.out.println("H (real) = ");
358                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.scalarMultiply(1/Hreal.getEntry(2, 2)).getData()));
359//              System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.getData()));
360                
361                List<Point2D> pntlistA = new ArrayList<Point2D>();
362                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(10, 7));
363                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(3, -1));
364                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(5, 5));
365                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(-6, 13));
366                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(0, 1));
367                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(2, 3));
368                
369                List<Point2D> pntlistB = new ArrayList<Point2D>();
370                for (Point2D a : pntlistA) {
371                        pntlistB.add(mapPointWithNoise(Hreal, a, NOISE));
372                }
373                
374                Point2D[] pntsA = pntlistA.toArray(new Point2D[0]);
375                Point2D[] pntsB = pntlistB.toArray(new Point2D[0]);
376                
377                
378                System.out.println("\nPoint correspondences:");
379                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
380                        Point2D a = pntsA[i];
381                        Point2D b = pntsB[i];
382                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f)\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), b.getX(), b.getY());
383                }
384                System.out.println();
385                
386                System.out.println("\n*************** WITHOUT NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
387                runTest(new HomographyEstimator(true, false), pntsA, pntsB);
388                
389                System.out.println("\n*************** WITH NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
390                runTest(new HomographyEstimator(true, true), pntsA, pntsB);
391        
392        }
393        
394        static void runTest(HomographyEstimator he,Point2D[] pntsA, Point2D[] pntsB) {
395                RealMatrix Hest = he.estimateHomography(pntsA, pntsB);
396                
397                System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
398                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
399                
400                Point2D[] pntsC = new Point2D[pntsA.length];
401                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
402                        
403                        pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
404                }
405                
406                System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
407                double sumDist2 = 0;
408                double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
409                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
410                        Point2D a = pntsA[i];
411                        Point2D b = pntsB[i];
412                        Point2D c = pntsC[i];
413                        double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
414                        sumDist2 += dist2;
415                        maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
416                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
417                }
418                System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
419                System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
420                
421        }
422
423}
